phrases: Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
The sound resonates Into my heart, so hard and deep
A field of stars spans endlessly
And through it I carve a passageway
In step with time as generations change
Close your eyes and listen closely
Shooting stars stream on silently until the goodbye
Keep the light inside of you, never give up do not ever lose
Transcend time and you will prove, there is a special place for you
A blaze of glory is there,
It is all a part of our estate; life is our story to create
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light Throughout the age, never fade away
A secret fire, a scream of light, voices calling through twilight
Cast your thoughts to the wind, hang your wishes on the moon
Live your life with all your strength for dreams will reach you very soon
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light
Throughout the age, never fade away
Someday your dream will find its place somewhere
Ill shoot you guys into the Seireitei with this.
I am the best pyrotechnic in Rukon District!
This is the special Kukaku Shiba Super-sized Fireworks Stage.
Do not say it before I do!
What kind of joke is this?!
You may be a fireworks expert or whatever,
but as if you could shoot us over with that-!
Place your palms on it and focus your spiritual energy!
How do you focus your spiritual energy?
If you are a Soul Reaper,
surely you know how to use your Kido.
This boy is the newbie Soul Reaper I told you about earlier.
He cannot use Kido at all.
Yeah Take it if you can.
I would rather die than be shown by you!
You think that the only thing guarding the Seireitei is that barrier,
That barrier is made from an ore known as SekkiSeki
that is rare even in Soul Society.
This is a fragment of it.
it completely breaks down spiritual energy.
That is why it is impossible
to bore a hole through the barrier with spiritual energy.
it emits a wave that breaks down spiritual energy from all sides.
Which means...that the Seireitai has a spherical barrier around it
from the sky to the underground.
And sothats where this comes in!
This is the Special Hard Spiritual Partition Penetration Device that I invented.
if all of you combined put your spiritual energy into this Spirit Core,
you can create a temporary cannonball that will break through the barrier.
I will shoot that cannonball with the Flower-Crane Cannon
and it will pierce straight through the barrier.
Go to the underground training room
and practice concentrating your spiritual energy!
Listen, if any one of you loses concentration,
you will blow up right there!
Go down below and help them practice.
Are you really going to help them?
What will I say to Brother?!
I told you Do not ever speak of it again!
Never show such a weak face in front of them!
I have had to wear the Lieutenant badge.
Its the first time I have been ordered to wear it like this!
Lieutenants are to put on their badges
and wait in the aids room 2.
No one else showed up yet?
Lieutenants are scattered all over Soul Society working diligently.
It might take about half a day for everyone to gather.
My Captain cannot be reached at all.
Who is your squad captain again?
Have you seen our Captain Aizen?
He is been acting strange lately.
But he will not answer when I ask him if anything's wrong.
I do not know what to do.
Even this summons will probably be cancelled soon.
In your view, should she die?
Just what the hell is going on, Captain Aizen?!
I have decided to help that Soul Reaper,
like the one who killed you.
and saw me not helping them, you would scold me, would not you?
Youwho loved Soul Reapers and died as a Soul Reaper.
It is quite narrow, but the shape is there.
The shape probably reflects his personality.
Oh, this isa bit unstable, but very powerful!
I can only conclude that you have no talent.
I said I do not understand!
Teach me some useful pointers, damn it!
You did not get to eat in Rukon District, did you?
Those guys cannot use spiritual energy.
So they do not get hungry.
I will come, after I figure this out.
Inoue, you are coming, too right?
Oh, I am not hungry at all yet, so it is okay.
N-No I want to practice some more.
Okay Since you are asking me.
Is she that important to you?
This Soul Reaper you are going to save.
Then did you, like, promise to save her?
She promised to pay you if you saved her.
No way I can use money from here in my world!
And I have not repaid her yet.
She gave me her power to save my family and me
even though she had just met me.
Because of that, she was arrested
and she is about to be executed.
I do not want to turn into a pathetic guy who would turn his back on her.
I am going to practice, too!
I am going to review the trick I developed myself.
Draw a circle in your heart
as dark as possible, and as heavy as possible.
Thenimagine yourself jumping right into the center of the circle.
This is the basic image that works for all Kido.
It is so easy I could cry!
I did not even have to practice it!
Y-You do not have to go that far.
ActuallyI was going to take it to Ichigo.
That is right, Kurosaki still has not
The Great Kukaku arm pillar is going to fall!
I never imagined it would turn out like this!
Gather your spiritual energy together already!
Were not you listening to me, fool?!
If you lose concentration, you will blow up!
You are just as guilty, idiot!
Both of you, no food tonight!
Why put me together with him?!
I get called so suddenly and look at this crowd?
The captains who control Soul Society are all here for me?
The Captain of the Squad 13 is not here.
He is absent with an illness.
I hope he gets better soon.
You know you were not summoned here for that.
I understand you went and played with the Ryokas by yourself.
You should have no trouble dealing with four or five Ryokas.
Oh, they did not die then?
Oh, I thought they were dead.
You can stop that monkey business.
Is no way that captain-level guys like us
would fail to tell instantly whether an opponent's Hakudo has ceased or not.
There they go again, stupid squabbling among old fools.
You make it sound like I let him go on purpose.
That is precisely what I am saying.
I am talking to him now.
Oh boy tempers are running high.
But I think the reason why you have been summoned
Acting alone, and letting the target escape
How do you defend your actions
There is nothing I can say to defend myself.
First, let me ask you something.
send a rhapsody filled with treasured thoughts
To the people who have always held me up.
Ill always be grateful for who you are.
I was casually walking through town
Around the time dusk fell and the city was bathed in red
It was an afternoon with crowds of people coming and going
I do not know why but I just stood there and watched
Then my cell phone started to vibrate and I made myself move
hoping it could fill in this hole in my heart
We got to hold each other up
I send a rhapsody filled with treasured thoughts
To the people who have always held me up.
Ill always be grateful for who you are.
Four students and one cat into Seireitei!
The Cannonball will be shot very soon.
Guests, take your seats now or else!
